p: Exposure to EO of Melaleuca alternifolia (25 μL⋅L –1 – light sedation) for 6 h decreased hepatic TBARS levels followed by an increase in glutathione-S-transferase activity ( Souza et al., 2018b). Finally, a sedative concentration (30 μL⋅L –1) of N. grandiflora EO enhanced protection against oxidative damage mainly in muscle and gills of tambaqui transported for up to 10 h ( Barbas et al., 2017b; Figure 2).
